articles.title: AMD Once Again Highlights VRAM Advantage of Radeon GPUs Over GeForce, 16 GB Starting At $499 - Wccftech
articles.description: AMD highlighted its VRAM advantage of Radeon GPUs over GeForce GPUs twice, saying they offer up to 16 GB memory starting at just $499 US.
articles.content:
This month, AMD has highlighted the VRAM advantage and value of its Radeon GPUs over GeForce GPUs twice, saying that they offer up to 16 GB memory with a starting price of just $499 US.
